rooms.name: Hagrid's Chamber
rooms.description: A trapdoor in the Third-floor corridor, which was guarded by the three-headed dog Fluffy.

rooms.name: Sprout's Chamber
rooms.description: A long and dark drop through the air led into a chamber full of Devil's Snare.

rooms.name: Flitwick's Chamber
rooms.description: A large, old-fashioned wooden door with a silver lock that would not open without the necessary key.

rooms.name: McGonagall's Chamber
rooms.description: The next chamber was so dark that it was impossible to see anything. It contained a Human Chess Game.

rooms.name: Quirrell’s Chamber
rooms.description: A chamber containing a mountain troll at the entrance; it had a foul odour in it.

rooms.name: Snape's Chamber
rooms.description: Upon entering the chamber, the entrance was blocked by purple flames, whilst the exit was covered by black flames.

rooms.name: Mirror of Erised
rooms.description: The final obstacle was the Mirror of Erised, designed and set by Albus Dumbledore.
